title: Draft a Settlement Agreement
description: The parties in a lawsuit have reached a settlement. An attorney needs to draft the settlement agreement to formalize the terms.

tasks.description: Review the settlement term sheet to understand the key terms (e.g., settlement amount, release of claims).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the agreed-upon terms.

tasks.description: Select the firm's standard settlement agreement template.
Draft the agreement, incorporating the specific settlement terms and including standard clauses like confidentiality and no admission of liability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a comprehensive draft settlement agreement.
